title: What are some good essay topics for an Ethics and Markets class? - Quora

response.answer_text: A couple of examples where a market situation was impacted one poorly and the other successfully. These could be late/early arrival of products or customers, music or other entertainment during the market: does either pull in customers or distract them? Of course, weather is often a factor. Does season have a significant affect, making people comfortable and cooperative or uncomfortable and cranky? How about an extremely rude customer, does his presence affect how much time customers spend there? Or a very loud, noisy or impolite seller?
